text: Chetanas Hazarimal Somani College Of Commerce & Economics and Chetana's Institute of Management & Research commonly known as Chetana College is a college located in Bandra(E), Mumbai, India, affiliated to the University of Mumbai.It is the 2nd oldest B-School in Mumbai. It is recognized by the University Grants Commission (India) and accredited by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with "A" Grade. ==See also== *List of colleges in Mumbai ==References== ==External links== * Category:Universities and colleges in Mumbai Category:Educational institutions established in 1961 Category:Affiliates of the University of Mumbai
title: Chetana College
